# Ignore Obsidian system files
.obsidian/
.obsidian_cache

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.log

# Ignore OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore temporary files from editors and IDEs
*.swp
*.swo
*~
*.idea/
.vscode/
*.code-workspace

# Ignore backup files
*.bak
*.backup
*.old
*.orig

# Ignore node_modules if using Node.js for scripts or plugins
node_modules/

# Ignore Python virtual environments
venv/
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*.egg-info/

# Ignore compiled files
*.class
*.o
*.out
*.exe

# Ignore archives
*.zip
*.tar.gz
*.7z
*.rar

# Ignore configuration files for local development
.env
.env.local
config.local.json
